{"step_by_step_thinking": "Tocilizumab is a drug used in the treatment of various autoimmune and inflammatory diseases. According to Document [1], tocilizumab is a monoclonal antibody that inhibits the binding of interleukin-6 (IL-6) to its receptor. This is different from tumor necrosis factor (TNF) inhibitors, which suppress the response to TNF, a part of the inflammatory response, as described in Document [0]. Therefore, tocilizumab is not a TNF inhibitor.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
